title: Sydney city life: 1899-1948
creator_credit: National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
brief_description: Explores the changes to inner city life in Sydney through five decades in a black and white production with a musical backdrop and without narration. Chronicles the story of ever-changing fashions, transport, architecture and everyday life and work.
creator_credit_for_label: National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
